review: Loving it so far. Easy to set up. More functionality and a better UX than our Apple TV.NOTE: had to restart my router to get wifi working during the first-time setup of the Fire TV Stick.Additionally, note to Panasonic TV users -- you may get a green flicker -- mine went away... hoping it doesn't come back. There are some google results for potential solutions.
author: Brkhrdi

review: Look, in theory? This thing is great. In practice? Two of the apps I'm most interested in using freeze all the time! HBO Go and the Hulu Plus app are both really glitchy and slow. They're constantly loading, or they freeze on a single frame in an episode. Even if I stop to let an episode buffer, it still has problems.Neftlix works beautifully, but not every app does. Buyer beware.
